story:
Oh no, your bank account has been
hacked by an evil hacker! With his
magical software, he is slowly
stealing all your precious money.
You must stop him before it is too
late!
ending:
Congratulations, you have
killed the evil hacker by
tossing his poor body into
a pool of lava.

However, it turned out he
was just an ordinary guy
who happened to own a
computer and live in a
dark castle.

You were losing money
because of a software
bug, not because of
mischief.

Oh well, we all make
mistakes sometimes!
hints_kb:
Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to
move. Press SPACE to jump.

Jump in the air to perform
a DOUBLE JUMP.
hints_gp:
Use ANALOGUE STICK or DPAD
to move. Press  to jump.

Jump in the air to perform
a DOUBLE JUMP.
